Add the code that was sent to your email
I accept the terms of the LGPD

COHIVE values the privacy of its users and is committed to protecting personal data in accordance with the General Data Protection Law (LGPD), Law No. 13.709/2018. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.

 1. Data Collection
 While using the COHIVE app, we may collect the following information:
 - Personal data: Name, email, phone, and other data provided voluntarily.
 - Browsing data: Information such as IP address, device type, operating system, and geolocation, when authorized.

 2. Data Usage
 We use the collected data to:
 - Provide and improve our services.
 - Send updates, notifications, and relevant information about the event or other COHIVE services.
 - Personalize the interface and content according to the user’s usage profile.

 3. Data Sharing
 COHIVE does not share personal data with third parties, except in cases of:
 - Compliance with legal obligations.
 - Provision of essential services by third parties.

 4. User Rights
 - Access your data: Request a copy.
 - Correct information: Correct inaccurate data.
 - Delete data: Request deletion, as legally permitted.

 5. Storage and Security
 - Secure storage and technical and administrative protection.

 6. Changes to the Policy
 - We will notify you about changes through the app.

 7. Contact
 - Questions? Contact us: cohive.you@gmail.com
